name: Boletin del Centro de Estudios Psicologicos (IAPSOP)
mytitle: Boletin del Centro de Estudios Psicologicos (IAPSOP)
content:
Boletin del Centro de Estudios Psicologicos (IAPSOP) About Archives Practices Contribute Contacts Search     Periodical: Boletin del Centro de Estudios Psicologicos Summary:  From Pat Deveney's database: Boletin del Centro de Estudios Psicologicos. 1930 Sabadell, Spain. Language: Spanish. Editor: Ramon Casanova. 1/1, April 1930. 14 pp., distributed without charge. The journal was intended to serve to introduce readers to all the activities of the Centro, including lectures on "Las modernas orientaciones de la economia social," "Materialismo y Espiritualismo," "Los siete senderos de evolucion," "El Naturismo cientifico como medio de regeneracion humana," etc., all of which centered around naturism, vegetarianism, and artistic matters. Noted in Oscar M. Garcia Rodriguez, "Hemerografia Espiritista Espaola, 1857-1936," https://grupoespiritaisladelapalma.wordpress.com. BNE. Issues:Boletin del Centro de Estudios Psicologicos V1 N1 Apr 1930
